data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Goal! Paul Onuachu heads Genk into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 25, That's a fine assist from Junya Ito.
Junya Ito (Genk) has received a first yellow card.
Steeven Willems (Charleroi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Genk.
The second half has started at Luminus Arena.
Goal! Saido Berahino (Charleroi) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Genk.
In the minute 48, Ryota Morioka instrumental with a fine assist.
Charleroi's Jules Van Cleemput has been booked in Genk.
Goal! Genk have got their heads in front thanks to a Joakim Maehle strike.
In the minute 63, Great play from Junya Ito to set up the goal.
Charleroi make their first substitution with Shamar Nicholson replacing Saido Berahino.
Jess Thorup is making the team's first substitution at Luminus Arena with Gerardo Arteaga replacing Jere Uronen.
In the minute 79, Jess Thorup (Genk) is making a second substitution, with Kouassi Eboue replacing Theo Bongonda.
The away team have replaced Jules Van Cleemput with Ken Nkuba. This is the second substitution made today by Karim Belhocine.
Paul Onuachu (Genk) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 82, Genk's Junya Ito has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
Dries Wouters is replacing Kristian Thorstvedt for Genk at Luminus Arena.
Patrik Hrosovsky is booked for the home team.
The match has come to a close in Genk. The final score is 2-1.
Guillaume Gillet is replacing Ali Gholizadeh for the away team.
